text: Eadweard cyng gret ealle mine biscopas & eorlas & þegnas on ælcere scire <þer> land licge in to Ealdan Mynstre.
& ic cyðe eow þæt ic hæbbe geunnen ælfwine biscop þæs byscoprices eall swa full & swa forð swa Cnud cing hit him firmest geuðe.

Þæt is þæt ic geann Criste & Sancte Petre & Sancte Paule in to þan halgan stede & him þæt hig beon heora sace wurðe & socne binnan port & butan tolles wurðe & teames forstealles & infangenes þeofes, hamsocne & mundbryces & ælces wites læssan & maran Gode to lofe for minre sawle & for ealra þæra cyninga þe ætforan me wæron & æfter me cumað.
& gif hwa þis awendan wylle sy he fordemed mid Iudan Scariothe butan he ær his forðsiðe hit gebete.
